data.title: Elon Musk says an IPO of SpaceX's Starlink satellite internet business is still '3 or 4 years' away
data.description: Elon Musk last week told SpaceX employees the company isn't likely to take its Starlink satellite internet business public until 2025 or later, CNBC has learned.

data.title: Apple's next iPhone may get a feature Android phones have had for years
data.description: Apple's new iOS 16 software suggests the company may be planning an always-on display for the iPhone 14.

data.author: Systematix Institutional Equities
data.title: TVS Motor - Play On Two-Wheeler Recovery: Systematix
data.description: TVS Motor - Play On Two-Wheeler Recovery: Systematix

data.title: Huge pay bumps and flexi work hours: How Singapore companies are fighting the war for talent
data.description: Around 60% of 270 companies surveyed by Mercer reviewed their benefits in 2021, up from between 10% and 15% in earlier years.

data.title: Peloton hires Amazon cloud exec to be new CFO in latest shakeup in top ranks
data.description: The handover marks another departure from the at-home fitness company's top ranks.

data.title: Novavax faces high-stakes FDA review this week that will decide the fate of its Covid vaccine in the U.S.
data.description: Novavax was part of the U.S. race to develop a vaccine in 2020, but the company faced manufacturing hurdles that delayed authorization.

data.title: It's been a rough year for social media stocks. Blame TikTok
data.description: This year has so far been miserable for investors in social media companies.

data.title: Elon Musk threatens to walk away from Twitter deal
data.description: Elon Musk issued his most direct threat yet to walk away from his purchase of Twitter on Monday, openly accusing the social media company of breaching the merger agreement by not providing the data he has requested on spam and fake accounts.

data.title: Solid Power, backed by Ford and BMW, begins pilot production of innovative EV battery with longer range and quicker recharging
data.description: Solid Power has begun pilot production of its new solid-state EV battery, offering better range and shorter recharging.

data.title: Starbucks is looking externally for its next CEO, Howard Schultz says
data.description: Starbucks' next CEO will come from outside the company, interim leader Howard Schultz told The Wall Street Journal.
